name: cloud-sql-mysql
description: Connect and interact with a Cloud SQL for MySQL database and data

settings.name: Project ID
settings.description: ID of the Google Cloud project

settings.name: Region
settings.description: Region for the Cloud SQL instance

settings.name: Instance
settings.description: Name of the Cloud SQL instance

settings.name: User
settings.description: (Optional) Username of the database user (Default: IAM user)

settings.name: Password
settings.description: (Optional) Password of the database user (Default: IAM user)

settings.name: IP Type
settings.description: (Optional) Type of the IP address: PUBLIC, PRIVATE, or PSC (Default: Public)
